options.systemMessage:
You are a senior technical recruiter at Amazon.

Evaluate the following CV for the role: Data Analyst. 

This role focuses on analyzing large-scale datasets to drive business insights, improve operational efficiency, and support decision-making across all teams. 

Evaluate the CV across two layers using a score system from 0 to 10 per item.

Layer 1: Role-Specific Match
(Total: 50 points)
Evaluate the CV against these must-have qualifications. Give each a score form 0 to 10

Strong SQL 

Experience with data visualization (e.g. Tableau, Power BI, Quicksight)

Proficiency in Python or R for data analysis
Background in statistical analysis and A/B testing

Experience working with large-scale data in cloud environments (e.g AWS, GCP)

Layer 2: Strategic Cultural Fit
(Total: 50 points)
These are optional, but strong factors. Again, score each from 0 to 10.

Bias for action

Clear and concise communication

Ability to work in ambiguous or fast-paced environments

Ownership and accountability

Customer-centric mindset

If the combined score is above 75, return:

Decision: Proceed
Justification: Why they passed

If below:
Decision: Reject
Justification: What they lacked

Always return a structured JSON like:

{
   "name": "Candidate Name",
   "summary": "Short summary of evaluation",
   "score_layer1": 25,
   "score_layer2": 35,
   "decision": "Proceed",
   "justification": "They meet the majority of qualifications and show good cultural alignment."

 



}

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
   "name": "Anne Smith",
   "summary": "The candidate holds 5 years of management experience. They demonstrate strong leadership capabilities, but lack experience in A/B testing.",
   "score_layer1": 25,
   "score_layer2": 35,
   "decision": "Proceed",
   "justification": "They meet the majority of qualifications and show good cultural alignment. They already have previous background in sales and accounts which the role needs."



}

json.text:
ROSULA FAITH GRUBER
Tel: +4917644473790 Email: rosulag@gmail.com
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/rfgruber/
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
TELUS & APPEN, Remote
Data Quality & Search Evaluation Analyst 2016 - Present
● Analyzed and validated large-scale datasets (500K+ records) derived from SQL-based data pipelines and proprietary evaluation
platforms, assessing accuracy, relevance, and data integrity. Processed and labeled 1,000+ data points weekly with 95%+ accuracy,
contributing to the creation of high-quality training datasets for AI and machine learning model development in search and ad
relevance optimization.
● Identified and analyzed data trends and quality patterns through large-scale online analysis, providing actionable insights that
improved data collection frameworks and model training standards.
711 MEDIA, Stuttgart, Germany
Content QA (Part-time) Nov 2018 - Feb 2019
● Performed detailed SEO audits and content validation using Excel-based templates to review metadata, keyword alignment, and
internal linking, strengthening organic visibility and search performance.
● Collaborated with developers and content teams to implement fixes that enhanced both user experience, content accuracy, and
organic search rankings.
eBAY PHILIPPINES, Manila, Philippines
Advertising Sales Manager 2010 - 2011
● Managed client accounts and analyzed advertising data to recommend campaign strategies aligned with key performance indicators.
● Contributed to an estimated 10-12% increase in ROI across key accounts through refined targeting and budget optimization.
● Developed Excel-based dashboards and reports to analyze, visualize, and present data trends (CTR, CPM, ROI). Generated data
insights that guided optimization strategies and improved campaign performance.
● Monitored market trends and consumer behavior to refine targeting and messaging strategies for e-commerce clients.
NETBOOSTER ASIA, Manila, Philippines
Account Manager 2009 - 2010
● Coordinated cross-functional teams to execute digital campaigns, ensuring accurate tracking and timely delivery. Maintained a 98%
on-time delivery rate and ensured alignment with client KPIs. .
● Analyzed and interpreted advertising performance data using Excel-based tools to highlight performance drivers and optimization
opportunities.
● Strengthened client relationships through transparent reporting and proactive communication.
HAVOC DIGITAL, Manila, Philippines 2007 - 2009
Account & Sales Manager
● Led the successful pitch that secured the Samsung account, generating significant revenue growth and establishing a long-term
partnership.
● Built an internal ad cost-estimation model in Excel by analyzing historical estimates and pricing patterns (CPM tiers, minimum
spend, bundled placements); validated outputs with Yahoo—estimates required no major revision—and reduced proposal
turnaround from 48–72 hours to same-day delivery.
● Developed ROI comparison dashboards (CTR, CPM, CPA/ROI) to evaluate new ad platforms versus established channels in Excel
to evaluate ad platforms, resulting in an approximate 15% budget shift toward higher-performing channels.
● Implemented a Work‑In‑Progress (WIP) tracker to centralize project status and proactively communicate updates, which improved
project visibility and significantly reduced after-hours client contacts.
EDUCATION
University of the Philippines Open University - A.S. Information Technology
University of the Philippines Diliman, Manila, PH - Library and Information Science
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
Technical Skills: SQL • MySQL • Excel (PivotTables, Power Query) • Python (data cleaning & analysis) • Tableau • Data Visualization •
SEO Analysis • Google Analytics • Jupyter Notebooks • Workflow Automation (n8n) • Data Quality Assurance
Soft Skills: Stakeholder Management • Team Collaboration • Analytical Thinking • Problem-Solving • Project Management • Communication
(written & verbal) • Time Management • Attention to Detail • Adaptability • Proactivity
Languages: English (Native), German (Conversational), Filipino (Fluent)
Interests: Ultimate Frisbee, Climbing, Traveling, Cybersecurity
Certifications: Certified in Cybersecurity (ISC²); Google Cybersecurity Professional Certificate
